website_summaries.verdict: Simple, yet effective, this modest-looking remote control is a reliable and inexpensive way to browse your top streaming services via the Xbox One console.
pros: Volume control for LG and Vizio TVs
Programmable for sound bar and TV control

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this remote. My parents had trouble using my Xbox controller to watch streaming services, but now they can turn on the tv and navigate to shows using the same simple remote. Programming it was easy - it automatically works with Xbox, so it was just a matter of following the instructions to set the volume/power buttons for the actual tv. My one complaint is that there aren’t any “spare” buttons; I used the “stop” button as the power button for the tv, but it’s not that big of a deal since there’s still a working pause button.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Huffman

customer_reviews.title: perfect for use on any Xbox one
customer_reviews.text: I love this little remote. Now I don't have to run the batteries down on my controller. I gave it 4 stars simply because it says in the description that it's programmed to Vizio soundbars but it's not. I even tried pairing as per the instructions but didn't work. Not that big of a deal really but just letting others know.
customer_reviews.author: Micah LTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Low key and great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Xbox one to not have to turn gaming controller on and off. Works well for that but also is now programmed to turn my tv on and off as well as change hdmi inputs. Compared to other universal remotes this one is simple and small with just the right amount of buttons. Only reason I didn’t give full 5 stars is it’s kinda cheesy looking. Idk what the knock off xbox logo is supposed to be but oh well. Worth it for price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Needs work but decent remote
customer_reviews.text: This remote works great IF you're within 6 feet of the Xbox. Once you get past that you have to hit the buttons over and over. Very aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great media remote!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this remote. The back cover was screwed in which was kinda a pain but once taken off, inserted batteries and the remote worked right away. No need to insert screw again,the cover stays in place. I will definitely continue to use Anderic products.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Casillas Jr

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I wouldn't have to use my son's X Box controller to watch movies. This works far easier and does not power down halfway through the movie. Make no mistake, the X Box is not the most convenient of interfaces for Blu Ray, but it makes no sense to buy a Blu Ray player when this does it just fine. So the remote is well worth the money. The only downside is we have a Fire TV that is more Bluetooth controlled, not IR, so this remote can't be programmed to raise and lower the volume. But that is a TV not a remote issue.
customer_reviews.author: James Wartian

customer_reviews.title: No TV power button
customer_reviews.text: This remote works well. You have to have it pointed directly at whatever you're trying to use though, so if I was using it on my xbox I have to lean over and angle it towards it, and if I was using it on my tv I have to make sure to point it directly at the tv light. It takes a lot of time to get the buttons from the tv remote to program on this remote, but once it's on there it works. Also, there is no TV power button, I couldn't overwrite another button for this feature either which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Holdaway

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Battery Saver!!
customer_reviews.text: With the kids watching Netflix or YouTube all the time, I felt like I was replacing batteries or recharging Xbox controllers non-stop. This controller is such a relief! No charging, no constant battery changing, works just like a regular TV remote. Even has the ABXY buttons so it's just like using an Xbox controller. Well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Works great, right from delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Great little Xbox One remote for the price! It worked excellently for my Xbox One without any necessary programming of the system. As soon as I added batteries to the remote, the remote easily synced to the system and just like that, easily played a bluray movie with no hassle whatsoever. If you just need a simple remote for your xbox one, this is a good one for a steal of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: And....it fell apart 8 months later
customer_reviews.text: Update: It has been eight months and the power button and d-pad have ripped off. No way to repair it. I expect more than just 8 months of periodic use. So into the electronic recycle it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Very nice device!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and works nicely with my Xbox one S console! Great for playing dvds without using a phone app or the actual controller. Haven’t tried any streaming apps yet with it but it works great with dvds.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Buttons falling off after 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: Had less than a month, works good, but buttons are already falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Works great but Amazon Prime app now won't recognize some buttons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Worked right out of the box to control my XboX One S-no programming needed. Cons: The Play/Pause and Rwd/Fwd buttons (6 buttons below direction pad) stopped working after 5 months of use-the light still lights up as if it's sending the signal but does nothing now (Edit: Works in Hulu app on XboX One just not Amazon Prime Video app and so changing rating back to 4 stars). I even tried changing the batteries to no avail. You have to aim at the xbox one pretty good for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Adipolle

customer_reviews.title: Best Xbox one Media Remote Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth time purchasing a different media remote for my Xbox one. I can already tell it’s going to be my favorite. It’s compact, the buttons have a good feel to them, and the remote can easily learn commands from other original remotes. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: NotFooledbyFrauds

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for people that come over and dont understand how to use the actual xbox controller (parents). It is easier for them to use. I mapped one of the buttons to power the TV. My only real complaint is it needs an actual button labeled TV. It doesn't have the range the xbox controller has but I can easily use it from the couch and that's all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Weak range
customer_reviews.text: I need to point 5 feet from X1 without any barriers in between. The actual Xbox One controller has an excellent range. Beware before buying unless your Xbox is super close to your couch :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Connor

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought it a month and a half ago as we were tired of using the XBox remote for TV viewing. Worked great until today when the OK button stopped working...it's the most-used button. Return window closed. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: tigerlily007

customer_reviews.title: Great little remote for Xbox video apps
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is less than half the cost of several other options, but it's a huge bang for the buck!! You can program any button on it using the learning feature, and we love that it has a volume up/down/mute button. This remote replaced another remote, and it's a great value and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great little remote. its Pretty close to the Microsoft version. Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have the Microsoft version but my daughter needed a remote but not going to spend $50 for the microsoft version. This remote works great. paper instructions could use some work but I figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Works as it is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy that this remote is programmed to control the volume on Vizio televisions. This feature eliminates the need to fumble with multiple controllers. It also does a great job interacting my xBox X.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This has already paid for itself in saving me an insane ammount of batteries for my Xbox one controll. It not pricey like some of the other remotes and probably works the same as them. Ive had no problems with it. Best Amazon purchase ive ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Jake lacy

customer_reviews.title: Good value and option for money
customer_reviews.text: Honestly? This is a great replacement for the outrageously priced Microsoft one. It works pretty well. Only difference is it NEEDS to be able to see the IR on the Xbox. Other than that, it’s great. I’d prefer to buy 3 of these for every 1 Microsoft one.
customer_reviews.author: William Crocker

customer_reviews.title: be careful
customer_reviews.text: Volume will only work on newer TVs or sound bars, also it will operate your apple TV, XBOX and TV all at once so if you are not careful you may inadvertently purchase things on the other devices without noticing. We found this out the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: O'Connor Fam

customer_reviews.title: Anderic Xbox controller
customer_reviews.text: Good control for Xbox. Has all the buttons for video player and scrolling through the menu or home button. Only programmable with a few other TV controllers for volume. Otherwise it works great
customer_reviews.author: D.K.

customer_reviews.title: Compact, sturdy, and simple to use!
customer_reviews.text: This remote made for the perfect replacement to my old Xbox One Media Remote. This one is far better than the Microsoft brand, and at a better price. As flashy and slick as the Microsoft brand remote was, it ran through batteries extremely fast and became unresponsive in weeks. The Anderic Xbox One Media Remote is small, lightweight, and very responsive. The button commands react far better than anything I've ever used. The button layout is simplistic with exactly the right amount of needed buttons. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: TheLegendOfJoel

customer_reviews.title: Great for watching YTTV through Xbox
customer_reviews.text: We cut the cable cord recently and switched to YouTubeTV via our Xbox One. I was constantly annoyed at having to turn on the Xbox controller every time I wanted to switch to watching a different channel and started looking at remotes. This one is great! It's so much easier to watch TV now that I can simply point and shoot with this remote.
customer_reviews.author: Karen in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Buttons make a click sound but you know they are working. Much better then the larger soft touch remotes, me buttons died in under a year. This one is simple, compact, comfortable to hold and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Creviston

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement remote.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a replacement to my original remote. Very easy to use and is small and sleek. I was somewhat confused at first setting up, because you have to point the receiver at your tv remote sensor to program other than your TVs sensor. Overall, great remote. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OwlFang4328

customer_reviews.title: Controlling an ATV 4k, Soundbar and Vizio TV with This
customer_reviews.text: It fits really well into my hand, the buttons have a nice feedback. I had bought a Harmony Express after using this for a year and just recently listed the Harmony on Craigslist because this is easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D

customer_reviews.title: worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked out of the box for my XB1. Trained a few other buttons on the remote to turn volume up and down and power on/off worked very well even with after market remote for TV
customer_reviews.author: WDNTULK2NO

customer_reviews.title: Requires Phillips head screwdriver for battery panel. (Won't be losing that!)
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. I'm saving the life of my controller batteries by so much. The remote is already programmed and works flawlessly with my Gen 1 Xbox One. Also the review about the "fake Xbox logo" and the remote "looks silly". What? Copyright infringement.
customer_reviews.author: Traumahawk

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Soooo glad I bought this. I find myself using my xbox as an entertainment center hub more and more, and my game controller batteries were dying so fast. Now I use this remote 90% of the time instead of wasting my game controller batteries.
customer_reviews.author: DJones

customer_reviews.title: Great remote!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this. I was tired of burning through controller batteries having to turn it on every time I wanted to pause or move through menus. This made my life much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: First one was DOA. They quickly sent another. No hassle. Great seller. Second works exactly as described. No programming at all for my Xbox One and older model Vizio tv
customer_reviews.author: Lida

customer_reviews.title: We love this!
customer_reviews.text: Had some issues setting it up, directions were a little confusing for us any way. But once we set it up it's been perfect. Super convenient for watching movies and Netflix. Saves our controllers batteries for when you actually need them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to sync up to our Xbox. Easy to use. Like the fact that we dont need to constantly turn on and off the Xbox controller to change channels or apps.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to program and use.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. We use the Xbox to watch Hulu, etc. and using the controller for that was confusing. With this remote I reprogrammed the X key to turn on the TV and programmed the remote for the volume with no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked straight out of the package
customer_reviews.text: Controls the Xbox just like the game remote, but uses less batteries, so when you are watching TV on your Xbox, you aren't blowing through your batteries and constantly getting the "controller batteries are low" notification.
customer_reviews.author: Pokin’ Fun

customer_reviews.title: sturdy remote
customer_reviews.text: I like this one over the talon more sturdy, no backlight but thats fine its snappy light and works from angles
customer_reviews.author: bugaloo

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: I love using it for hulu,Netflix, and DVDs on my xbox, Way easier to use than a wireless controller!
customer_reviews.author: Jazy

customer_reviews.title: Great TV remote for the xbox one
customer_reviews.text: The remote for the xbox one works really well to watch TV and/or other digital applications on the xbox 1
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Compact and works, not fast
customer_reviews.text: This remote was smaller than I imagined when I ordered it however it’s about the same size as the fire remote. It work but not quick or responsive like a native controller. Patience is a virtue
customer_reviews.author: Dean Edouarde

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: I love this controller easy to install the only bad thing is that use triple a battery a little expensive that’s all but works really good
customer_reviews.author: Akira

customer_reviews.title: Great remote!!
customer_reviews.text: Connected right away. When our surround sound is on, it also controls the volume of that with the tv so I don’t have to use separate remotes! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lorianna

customer_reviews.title: Difficult or impossible to put in batteries
customer_reviews.text: I could not open the case to put in the batteries. And I tried and tried and then tried again. There was no instruction sheet with the remote showing how to open the case. There were no markings indicating where or how to open the case. That's the first time a product has simply been a total failure for me. So i'm out about 15 USD, I tossed it in the trash and got on with my life.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L Essman

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: this inexpensive remote runs my xbox just like a normal controller. very easy to set up and use. and the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: DBurgie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Able to easily switch between apps and control media for playback (Netflix, Prime Video, Kodi, etc.). Unfortunately, I've already had two of the buttons fall off within the first month of use. Fortunately, they weren't the buttons I use most often.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Putman

customer_reviews.title: Great Third Party Remote
customer_reviews.text: I was fed up with first party remotes. I found this one by chance and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: It works! 📲
customer_reviews.text: I tried to format the remote no need, it is already programmed... which is... exactly what I like! Five ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Stars. I accidentally erased all programming and it still knew how to control my Xbox One Natively.
customer_reviews.author: Jaden

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something to make using apps & watching shows easier on the Xbox. This did the job.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great remote
customer_reviews.text: Controller is very easy to use no programming needed work for both my xbox systems
customer_reviews.author: Chris Silva

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It works well now I can use my Xbox one x comfortably as a media machine.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Life and Battery saver. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Life and battery saver. Everything works great except I couldn't figure out volume control. No biggy though. Alot better than using game remote; turning it on and off to switch what youre watching etc.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew curnutte

customer_reviews.title: Very good for a very good price
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day and it works great. Haven't had any issues with it at all
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Makes streaming TV on the XBox simple
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. So much better than using the controller for functions other than playing games.
customer_reviews.author: S. & K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good remote, Great Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Best xbox one remote I've used. Also, I needed a replacement and they helped me through it fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: TheGrayBear

customer_reviews.title: Works like it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I put batteries in it worked! Simple plug and play. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Hank D

customer_reviews.title: No more wasting batteries on my Xbox controller!
customer_reviews.text: I can now binge-watch all the shows on my Xbox without turning my controller on and off. Does the trick very nicely! I also have a couple Vizio TV's and it works well on those devices.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Xbox media controller
customer_reviews.text: Works great cause I don’t like using the Xbox game controller .Buy it excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Marco Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: This is most likely what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to save your controllers batteries, and it makes using the Xbox as a media center soo much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Hooty

customer_reviews.title: Works out of the box
customer_reviews.text: You have to be close and right in front of the Xbox to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sam montiango

customer_reviews.title: Uses a small screw at the battery cover plate
customer_reviews.text: Hate the fact that there’s a screw to close the battery cover.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mamaradlo

customer_reviews.title: I really like the strap 👍
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy not having to use the game controller when using other apps
customer_reviews.author: jmsjeep

customer_reviews.title: XBOX controls work as advertised.  No instruction manual for programming for TV.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for XBOX. Like some others have said, this remote came with no instruction manual, so I am on my own to figure out how to program it to work with the volume controls for the TV.
customer_reviews.author: big ugly

customer_reviews.title: No range. Have to point directly at xbox.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy unless your xbox is less than 6ft away from where you'll be sitting .. remote has no range
customer_reviews.author: Michael Price

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect with the Xbox used as a streaming device programmed the volume control for projector. And we are all set one little control for the kids to access the streaming app. Susanna an awesome remote
customer_reviews.author: Manic cam

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Very shabby. Low quality. Weak signal with delay when button is pressed. Junk in a word.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, no programming required and controls our tv remote again. Best Buy in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Awsome little remote. Works great. Control the volume in my LG TV and didn't even need to program it.
customer_reviews.author: Jobi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Get it. Only slight problem is that you pretty much have to point it directly at the xbox in order to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works decently, but cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: After only a month of use the mute button fell out of the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Mizell

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is an absolute joke. Brand new batteries dead in three days with pretty minimal use. Otherwise, it works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Weak. Find myself having to get close to use. Then whats the point of a remote
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Get this one
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this remote the programmable separate keys are super trick. Way better than the factory Xbox remote.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works fine for the Xbox controls but adding tv power/volume is a challenge
customer_reviews.text: This product is difficult to program and the instructions direct you to a closed web link
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: limited distance
customer_reviews.text: very limited distance - you must be close to the XBox
customer_reviews.author: HerbsterTV

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says
customer_reviews.text: It's as easy as point and click with this remote. Super convenient for streaming without killing controller batteries
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Purchase this - makes life better
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Does what it says. No issues. Changes how you do netflix with the xbox one =)
customer_reviews.author: Randy nunez

customer_reviews.title: Better than original
customer_reviews.text: Works and has x,y,b,a unlike one from Microsoft that is not made. Now to see how durable it is in the long run
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work super well... Cheap and difficult to operate. Did not sync with TV
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy another.
customer_reviews.text: This a nice update to the original Xbox one remote. It’s easy to program if you have the original remote.
customer_reviews.author: jeff yurcak

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy
customer_reviews.text: A joy that the trolled or R thing I dislike is there is no backlight for button uses at nightime
customer_reviews.author: Dynasia

customer_reviews.title: Good, but....
customer_reviews.text: I love it except that I cannot control the volume with it. I wish it would control the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne L. Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect with our Xbox one and our sons as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are good
customer_reviews.text: The plastic in glasses were bad. I couldn’t use them.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Volume control does not work
customer_reviews.text: The volume control only works with the down side. The up button does not work
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get the volume buttons to program to my TV. The range was very poor.
customer_reviews.author: stephen williamson

customer_reviews.title: Universal remote
customer_reviews.text: Great remote, easy to program with TV for power on/off.
customer_reviews.author: D.Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Better to spend xtra $ and get original remote
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn't work well unless you ate a foot away from console.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Those remote is perfect for those who are not tech savvy!
customer_reviews.text: We use the remove to better control the Xbox One.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Over the top
customer_reviews.text: Bought this remote for my xbox 1. In no way did I expect it to link automatically to my tv too. The fact I can turn up, down and mute the tv all with this remote. So happy! Wish could find one like this for my ps3 or ps4, I'd buy those too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael g.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box, makes my batteries last so much longer and is 100% accurate for my Xbox One.
customer_reviews.author: Chillaxter13

product_meta.title: Anderic Xbox One Media Remote Control with Learning - Standard IR Xbox Remote with A,B,X,Y Buttons - Works for Xbox One, Xbox One S, Xbox One X - RRXB01
feature_bullets: Easy-to-use remote to control your entertainment - Compatible With Xbox One X, Xbox One S, Xbox One
Stays on, eliminating the need to keep turning on an Xbox One controller to control your Xbox One. + Learning Function: Learns to Sound bars and TV's for volume
Guide button provides one-touch, quick access to all of your favorites in one place.
Control video playback for Blu-ray movies and streaming video on Xbox One.
Includes wrist strap and screw - Includes instructions - 2 AAA batteries Required (sold separately) - Xbox Media Remote, Xbox One Remote, Xbox One media remote

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars261 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
